I noticed this doesn't appear to be scoped to a user's friends, but can enable you to see pretty much every username on the site, if you're clever enough. Since you allow logins with username, is this a security risk?
Not unless they know the user's password, and we rate limit logins so that you can only try so many before you're locked out
the only thing is... if you're a user who wants to be very private (like, only participate in private groups) it means your username is still exposed in a somewhat public way
